plot outline: Lala is a lazy village lad while searching for his certificate he finds and old Dholki and starts playing the instrument like a maestro.Lala gets a job as a peon at the village school but due to his past cant sustain the job for more than a day, his new passion of Dholki surprises the villagers but makes his mother worried as his father had gone missing due to this passion and the village Sarpanch and Patil were involved in it.
title: Dholki
plot: _Dholki_ (qv) is a marathi film portraying a village simpleton and a series of comical events leading to a dark revelation from his past!

Lala is a lazy village lad while searching for his certificate he finds and old _Dholki_ (qv) and starts playing the instrument like a maestro.Lala gets a job as a peon at the village school but due to his past cant sustain the job for more than a day, his new passion of _Dholki_ (qv) surprises the villagers but makes his mother worried as his father had gone missing due to this passion and the village Sarpanch and Patil were involved in it.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
